name: Writhing Ringworm
description: Is it alive? Maybe. Is it fashionable? ...Maybe.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 7,216 to 8,820 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 267 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,162 Strength. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 100,273 Nature damage over 8 sec.

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
